text: Nicholas Edward "Nick" Palatas (born January 22, 1988) is an American actor. He has appeared in two short movies, titled The Erogenous Zone and Love and has been in several ads. In 2009, he played Norville "Shaggy" Rogers in the movie, Scooby-Doo! The Mystery Begins and reprised the role in Scooby-Doo! Curse of the Lake Monster which released in October 2010. ==Personal life== Palatas has two brothers, Phillip Palatas and actor Cameron Palatas. He is married to Marissa Denig (sister of actress Maggie Grace), with whom he has three children, Vienna, Edward and Deanna. == Filmography == ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 2006 Aquamarine Daniel Brown 2007 The Erogenous Zone Flip Fowler Love School Boy 1 Nancy Drew Greg Drew 2008 Love School Boy 1 Short Film 2009 Scooby-Doo!
